metadata.title: Cisco CCNP Security SCOR 350-701 Practice Questions

questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within Security Concepts (Domain 1)?
questions.explanation: PKI/Certificates is a key concept in Security Concepts. This domain covers topics essential for the Cisco CCNP Security SCOR exam.

questions.question: A professional is tasked with compare security vulnerabilities in software and hardware. What should be the first step?
options: Assess the current state and identify requirements
Document the findings in a report
questions.explanation: The first step in any security concepts task is to assess the current state before implementing changes.

questions.question: Which concept in Security Concepts is most closely related to describe cryptographic components and protocols?
questions.explanation: Describe cryptographic components and protocols falls under the implementation and operations aspect of Security Concepts.

questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within Security Concepts (Domain 1)?
questions.explanation: TLS/SSL is a key concept in Security Concepts. This domain covers topics essential for the Cisco CCNP Security SCOR exam.

questions.question: Which of the following is a key consideration when working with explain common threats against on-premises and cloud environments?
options: Following industry best practices and standards
Reducing the number of team members involved
questions.explanation: When working with explain common threats against on-premises and cloud environments, following industry best practices ensures consistent and reliable results.

questions.question: Which of the following best describes the purpose of "Compare security vulnerabilities in software and hardware" in Security Concepts?
options: To implement and manage compare security vulnerabilities in software and hardware processes
To evaluate compliance with security concepts standards
questions.explanation: Compare security vulnerabilities in software and hardware is a key objective in Security Concepts. Understanding this concept is essential for the exam.

questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within Security Concepts (Domain 1)?
questions.explanation: PKI/Certificates is a key concept in Security Concepts. This domain covers topics essential for the Cisco CCNP Security SCOR exam.

questions.explanation: Describe security intelligence authoring and sharing falls under the implementation and operations aspect of Security Concepts.

questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within Network Security (Domain 2)?

options: Following industry best practices and standards

questions.question: Which of the following best describes the purpose of "Describe deployment models of network security solutions" in Network Security?

questions.explanation: Describe deployment models of network security solutions is a key objective in Network Security. Understanding this concept is essential for the exam.

options: Assess the current state and identify requirements
Document the findings in a report
